page.title: 20Childrens'Street Games
page.content: {Top and Whip:}To play Top and Whip you need a stick with a piece of long leather attached and a spinning top. you wind the leather round the top and pull the leather away to spin the top. You can continue to make the top spin by striking it with the leather. {Two Balls:}You have two balls and they are thrown separately against a wall and caught. there are a number of variations to this game. {Hide and Seek:}You need four or more friends, one of them closes their eyes and counts, the rest go and hide, following the count the one who is 'it' tries to find the rest. {Skipping:}You need a rope, you hold one end of the rope in each hand, bring it over your head and jump over it.
